gameDetails.name: The 7th Continent: The Veins of the Earth
gameDetails.description:
Delve deep below the Continent in order to unlock its secret and triumph over the Evil consuming you. Your actions will be limited as the current draws you ever deeper.

—description from the publisher

You do not need this expansion if you already have the collector's edition (white box) of the What Goes Up, Must Come Down expansion from the Kickstarter campaign.
